Description: ServiceNow helps to transform old, manual ways of working into modern digital workflows. Employees and customers get what they need, when they need it—fast, simple, easy.
Name: ServiceNow

Methods.Name: Create Record
Methods.Description: Inserts one record into the configured table.

Methods.Name: Modify Record
Methods.Description: Updates only the specified record fields.

Methods.Name: Replace Record
Methods.Description: Replaces the specified record with the data specified in the request.

Methods.Name: Get Record
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified record by sys_id.

Methods.Name: List Records
Methods.Description: Retrieves multiple records for the configured table.

Methods.Name: Delete Record
Methods.Description: Deletes the specified record by sys_id.

Methods.Name: Create Incident Record
Methods.Description: Inserts one record into the configured table.

Methods.Name: Delete Incident Record
Methods.Description: Deletes the specified record by sys_id.

Methods.Name: Update Incident Record (PUT)
Methods.Description: Replaces the specified record with the data specified in the request.

Methods.Name: Get Incident Record
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified record by sys_id.

Methods.Name: List New Incident Records
Methods.Description: Retrieves multiple records for the configured table that have been created since lastrun.

Methods.Name: List Updated Incident Records
Methods.Description: Retrieves multiple records for the configured table that have been created or updated since lastrun.

Methods.Name: Update Incident Record (PATCH)
Methods.Description: Updates only the specified record fields.

Methods.Name: List Incident Records
Methods.Description: Retrieves multiple records for the configured table.
